item.title: Megan add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Megan add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Megan add a quote by barbara kingsolver
Megan add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Megan add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Megan add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.description: "I'm not talking to anyone, I'm delivering a monologue. It's the inebriated man's prerogative." -- Carlos Ruiz Zaf贸n

item.title: Megan add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zaf贸n
item.description: "I've always said that idleness dulls the spirit. We have to keep the brain busy, or at least the hands if we don't have a brain." -- Carlos Ruiz Zaf贸n

item.title: Megan add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "I always thought insanity would be a dark, bitter feeling, but it is drenching and delicious if you really roll around in it." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Megan add a quote by tim gautreaux
item.description: "You know they ain't bad people. They're just uneducated, unsophisticated, untraveled, immoral, and uncivilized. Plus stupid." -The Missing" -- tim gautreaux

item.title: Megan add a quote by Justin Halpern
item.description: "Nobody likes practice, but whats worse: practicing or sucking at something?...Oh give me a fucking break, practicing is NOT worse than sucking." -- Justin Halpern
